home.description: Eurofurence {number} will take place from {dates}. Eurofurence is Europe's largest and longest-running annual gathering, celebrating the furry community across the continent.
home.title: Home

venue.description: This year's venue is the Congress Center Hamburg (CCH). Come in and find out about the enormous venue we're about to fill with animal noises and fur.
venue.keywords: Venue, CCH, Hamburg, Convention Center, Accommodation
venue.title: The CCH Hamburg (Venue)

venue/map.description: The function space map! This is your ultimate 'How to get around!'

venue/map.title: Venue Map

hotels.description: Get a room! Here are some official options for you.
hotels.title: Venue - Nearby Hotel Options

restaurants.description: Due to allergies, intolerances, or ethical choices, some furries may have limited dining options. To support them, we've created a map highlighting restaurants that offer vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options.
restaurants.keywords: Hotel, Dining, Restaurants, Vegetarian, Vegan, Food, Eating
restaurants.title: Venue - Nearby Dining Options

artshow.description: The Eurofurence Art Show is a large art exhibition. It is your chance to display your works and/or purchase a fine piece of art for your home.
artshow.keywords: Art Show, Art, Display, Artwork, Prints, Originals, Bidding
artshow.title: Art Show - General Information

dealersden/visiting.title: Dealers' Den
dealersden/visiting.description: The Dealers' Den is the place for you to browse and buy all kinds of arts and fine products for your favorite merchants and artists.

about.description: Learn more about Eurofurence, its theme, values, people and history.

about.title: More about Eurofurence

venue/supporters.description: A lists of companies supporting the Eurofurence IT Infrastructure.

charity.description: This year all donations, collections and more will go to support {charity}.

events.description: General information for those interested in organizing a panel or event at Eurofurence. The schedule will be posted here shortly before the convention.

openstage.description: Eurofurence Open stage is here as always. Come in and join us for various smaller artists and events.

goh.description: Again we have some special people amongst us - our Guests of Honor. This year we have {goh}.

furauction.description: At the Eurofurence Furauction, you get the chance to bid for a chance to spend quality time with your favourite fursuiter in a one-on-one setting, while also donate money to charity! From chats and hugs to photoshoots, everything is possible!
furauction.title: Furauction

jobs.description: You want to help Eurofurence and become staff at Europe's biggest furry convention? Read on for currently open positions.
